summary: REQ-56 (startup retry flow) appears to be implemented via a new/updated StartupBootstrapError screen and a useActorBootstrapStatus hook that removes/cancels cached actor queries and triggers refetch. REQ-55 is primarily an operational rebuild/redeploy outcome and cannot be verified from the provided code diff; additionally, the diff includes multiple functional/product changes beyond a rebuild-only redeploy, and it modifies files that were explicitly constrained as immutable.

missing_requirements.requirement: Trigger a rebuild and redeploy of the existing application (no functional changes required) to restart the stopped backend canister causing IC0508.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows code changes but does not include any deployment/redeploy configuration or evidence that a rebuild/redeploy was executed successfully or that IC0508 is resolved post-deploy. This requirement is primarily operational and is not demonstrable from the diff summary.
evidence: File diff summary (no deploy pipeline/config changes shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: Do not edit immutable frontend hook paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary indicates modifications to immutable paths (useActor.ts and main.tsx), violating the stated constraint.

missing_requirements.requirement: No new product features or UI redesign beyond what is necessary to validate the rebuild/redeploy recovery.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff introduces multiple changes that look like new/expanded product behavior (PWA/service worker, admin pages, about page, branding/copy changes, profile editing), which goes beyond what is necessary solely to validate a redeploy recovery.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions PWA support, service worker, About page, admin pages, profile editing, logo/branding updates)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated PWA support including manifest references, service worker behavior, caching strategy, and update-handling reload logic.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-55/REQ-56, which are focused on rebuild/redeploy recovery and ensuring retry flow works; PWA changes constitute additional functionality.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/main.tsx" service worker registration and update handling; "frontend/public/sw.js" cache version/network-first strategy; "frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest")

hallucinated_features.description: Sign-in screen UI overhaul with new marketing/feature highlight copy and layout changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; REQ-55 only requires rendering to the expected Sign In screen post-deploy, not a redesign.

hallucinated_features.description: New/expanded admin and informational pages (AdminDashboardPage, AdminInviteTokensPage, AboutPage) and related behaviors.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the rebuild/redeploy recovery requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Profile page changes to support inline editing and updated backend TypeScript interface for profile methods.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-55/REQ-56 (which focus on startup initialization/retry behavior).
